messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Digest Number 61
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/27/2004 4:06:31 PM Central Standard Time, unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com writes: Well you ll be happy to know, that Ren s beach party
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/27/2004 4:06:31 PM Central Standard Time,
unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com writes:
Well you'll be happy to know, that Ren's beach party is now officially the
next Live and Learn conference!:) So you can take one trip and get it ALL
in.
I expect all of you to start saving money to come hang out with me at the
beach, and listen to some great unschooling speakers.
***
Oh, how exciting...you don't know HOW happy you've made me today! I just
mentioned it to DH and he was up for it, too. Ren...can you tell me again
exactly which 'beach' we're talking about? Seems like I remember that is was on the
FL gulf coast, right?? I wanna start looking into accommodations!

Thanks,
Denise


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
